Sophistication, Style and Seclusion
Set on a sprawling approx.1450m2 allotment amidst beautiful established gardens, this captivating c1906 heritage residence showcases classic elegance living in Lang Lang enviable Rosebery Street location. Beyond the picturesque facade, the home reveals a lavish single level layout defined by traditional heritage features and tastefully transformed interiors to create the ultimate in sophisticated comfort and style.
Introduced by a gracious entry and wide central hallway, immediately reveals stunning formal lounge, grand study, 3 quality bedrooms with BIRs, master with ensuite and feature fireplace. The striking kitchen is a focal point of the family domain, well appointed, it overlooks the expansive open plan living and dining space that flows out through to a second lounge or rumpus room, with ducted heating and cooling.
There is easy access for all vehicles, this property is well set up for a home business, with a 12mx7m shed set up with power, concrete flooring and also a carport 6m x 6m to the side of the main shed and other sundry shedding for wood & equipment.
Currently the property sits on one title, so the possibility exists to potentially subdivide ( STCA )
The large block provides ample space for up to 6 cars, parking, boat & caravan storage.

Property Code: 1971

Gardening or Fishing?? Why Not Have Both!!
Nestled at the back of this large 1062m2 allotment on a quiet road this cute 2 bedroom log cabin is waiting for its new owners to move in. Surrounded on three sides by a wide veranda with views to the gardens this property offers privacy, yet the generous size of the block gives a feeling of room to move.
Keeping in style with log cabin design the home has high ceilings and exposed beams, cosy wood panelling and country style light fittings. The house is kept warm from a combustion wood heater that doubles as a stove top/oven, handy for cooking that mouth-watering stew over winter. The cosy kitchen includes gas cooking, pantry, and overlooks the raised brick garden beds you could grow your herbs and veggies in. Both bedrooms have built in robes, the master with extra storage space, and the bathroom is in a handy central location.
Outside in the garden you will find no less than 12 varieties of established fruit/nut trees, an extra water tank to supply the kitchen, chook yard and a fully fenced yard. Add these to the roses and other flowering plants being self -sufficient could very easily become a reality, imagine the dollars saved! The man of the house is no less spoiled with an extra-large shed to the front of the property that has roller doors at both ends allowing for easy access or drive through. Power is connected, there is a mezzanine floor with loads of storage space and insulation has been added, making it the perfect potential man cave or boat/car area. At the front of the drive is a solid gantry for lifting those boat motors (we all know how heavy they can be right!!!) or any other block and tackle requiring maintenance. There is water connected at the shed to hose down the boat after catching your dinner in the bay only three minutes away.
Corinella is a developing area offering newly revamped 24 hour boat ramp, café and restaurant, general store/post office/ bait and tackle store, community centre, tennis courts, lawn bowls, local primary school and day care centre. Ten minutes away is Grantville, where you will find chemist, post office, cafes, doctor, ambulance depot and more. The dual lane bass highway is a mere 5 minutes drive for easy commute to the cbd, or enjoy the scenic 25 minute drive to famous Phillip island and get great views overlooking western port bay.

Offering family home, granny flat/business quarters and loads of potential. With just some of the property's features listed below;
- 3 bedroom brick home with separate dining & lounge areas.
- 1 bedroom plus office/2 bedroom brick granny flat with kitchen & bathroom.
- Fenced to 6 paddocks, all with water & with a wide central laneway allowing great access.
- Numerous shedding, including workshop, 3 car garage & old chicken sheds.
- Stock yards, ramp & silos.
This property has a lot on offer and is sure to suit many needs.
Whether you are looking to run a business from home, setup for agisting horses, run cattle, revitalise the old chicken sheds for use and or need 2 dwellings for a large family, this property is for you.
For all enquiries & inspections please Call Jason Brown Direct.

Serene water views, peaceful court location in Corinellas most prestigious street
Experience panoramic water views from this brand new, 6-star-energy rated property featuring an elevated, light-filled, open-plan living area, where double-glazed windows capture Westernport Bay in all its beauty.
With six-plus years of building warranty remaining, your new three-bedroom, split-level home in a quiet, end-of-court location has been thoughtfully designed and constructed to ensure optimum comfort, and internal and external colour selections reflect the calm and peaceful setting. Your private ensuite with on-trend double shower and heated lights, adjoins a master bedroom that comfortably fits a king-sized bedwhile retractable ceiling fans cool the bedrooms on hot summer nights. Live in comfort all year as the large, reverse-cycle air-conditioner controls climate to meet your needs.
Quality blinds, carpet, and light fittings have been meticulously selected to complement the decor throughout. And, with built-in robes to all bedrooms, a smart door-lock, under-house parking for easy access, concrete paths and driveway, speedy NBN internet, and a large balcony/entertainment deck with 180-degree views, you can confidently move right on in. Set on a 585m block, there is plenty of room for your boat and caravan.
This impeccably presented home represents a complete, contemporary lifestyle package as a relaxing weekender from city life, for a peaceful retirement, or as an investment in the hidden jewel of Victorias Bass Coast. Known for its sense of community, the area features vineyards, local markets, and of course, major events and tourist attractions at nearby Philip Island and San Remo.
And, with just a two-minute stroll to Corinella beach and walking tracks, and a short walk to the general store, this unique property has all you need, and more.
Once you discover your new home in Corinella, youll never want to live anywhere else.
Call Tamara or Daniel today.

Display Home Quality and Finish
Located in the sought after Summerfields Estate is this almost new family home. Surrounded by brand new homes and overlooking the Lang Lang Showgrounds Reserve. The home is only a short walk to everything that downtown Lang Lang has to offer. The Lang Lang Primary school is only a short trip around the corner too.
The home itself has been built with quality and functionality throughout. The sun drenched North facing living area is a real highlight. Situated on a large block of 656m2 you will enjoy not only a large family home, but also a large rear and side yard as well.
Opening up to the spacious hallway you will feel the high 9ft ceilings straight away, giving the home a more liveable feel than most other homes. The master bedroom is completed with the double vanity with matching his and hers sinks and mirrors. Completed with Ceasarstone benchtops the bathroom is both airy and spacious.
Moving down the hallway you will get to the point where the home opens up and you will decide that this is the one. Open plan in its design the entertainers kitchen with Caesarstone benches will bring out the Masterchef in you. Cook in the 900m oven with same size gas cooktop. Another added feature being the glass window splashback, which not only adds light in during the day, looks just amazing at night too. And these days a kitchen is not complete without your own butlers pantry.
The meals and living area are one of the real highlights of the home. Facing north, the area is bathed in light. Bringing the outside inside you also have access through the triple stacker rear doors to your alfresco areas for those warm summer nights.
And if you have children who want double beds the remaining three bedrooms are all oversized and would have plenty of room left over.
Complete with gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
The double garage has remote and internal access, there is also potential for rear access down the side of the home as well if you have a boat or caravan.
I'm not sure where to stop, there is plenty more highlights, so I will finish with an old real estate cliché, an inspection will not disappoint, so make sure to book in an inspection or attend any advertised open home.
This property is available for private inspection most days. Just send us an email enquiry and we will automatically respond with the available open times.
To ensure there is enough demand to inspect the property, please advise us of your wish to attend by simply following these instructions.
- Book inspection
- Select a date and time based on the options displayed
- Enter your details
- Select register inspection time
Youre finished! Well keep you updated if anything changes, but otherwise we look forward to meeting you at our Hodges Open for Inspection.
**Photo ID required at ALL inspections.
** Investors: Did you know Hodges Real Estate Cranbourne has the highest Google ranking for Property Management in the Casey area? Our department head of rentals Ben Doughton has appraised this property at $380 p/w - $400p/w ($1,651 -$1,738pcm) for more details about leasing contact Ben on 03 5996 5993 today.

MILLION DOLLAR VIEW under half the price!
If you are looking for once in a lifetime opportunity to own a piece of tightly held waterfront property then this is your only chance !
It won't last long....
This property is unique to this stretch of Malcolm Drive in that it offers the opportunity for further development (STCA) as it is situated on approx 837 square metres with a 30 metre long absolute foreshore.
Create your own Million Dollar backyard through subdivision - your future retirement is assured.
The views are exceptional in every direction, you can see French Island from your very own backyard and enjoy the water sunsets every night - with direct access to the foreshore you can enjoy long walks along the beach and enjoy the sunsets with a drink - as you wonder what the rest of us are doing.
Not only do you get all of the above, but you have a cosy two bedroom cottage with beautifully freshly polished original floorboards, open plan living with a reverse cycle unit, Wood fire for cosy winter nights, a country timber kitchen, with electric cooktop, dishwasher and plenty of storage . Two good sized bedrooms with robes and a shared bathroom with corner spa bath . The beautiful sunroom spans the length of the cottage capturing beautiful bay views over French Island whilst you enjoy your early morning coffees.
A separate toilet is located in the sunroom for guests.
A further brilliant opportunity exists just outside the sunroom - a bungalow, separate entrance - this could be used as a trendy teenage retreat or add additional dollars to your household and list it on AirBnb.
Endless opportunities! Be sure to put this property on your inspection list - contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley to arrange your inspection!
